segments.text: What places does the tour include ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will visit the Hyde Park , Poet's Corner , Tower of London , Fleet Street and Tower Bridge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So many places I have been looking forward to . We will take part in the group .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you will enjoy your journey .
segments.speaker: S2
